casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arles EUCEDA-VALLE. No. 211P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Mary Carla Hollis, Assistant Attorney General, Sam Currin, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 858.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of April 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review or Writ of Certiorari":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
